headline.main: 15-Inch Shells Are Used By Japan as Air Bombs

lead_paragraph: At Pearl Harbor the Japanese introduced, in addition to two-man submarines, another new weapon in the form of 15-inch armor-piercing shells, fitted with fins to convert them into aerial bombs and dropped from tremendous heights.
abstract: Jap use of armored shells as air bombs in Pearl Harbor attack discussed
snippet: At Pearl Harbor the Japanese introduced, in addition to two-man submarines, another new weapon in the form of 15-inch armor-piercing shells, fitted with fins to convert them into aerial bombs and dropped from tremendous heights....
